pr_title: [velux] fix concurrency bugs, other minor issues, update readme.md (replaces #8493)

timeline.bodyText: Empty Command (used to send nothing and process an incoming message only).
timeline.author: gs4711

timeline.bodyText: would suggest to replace the three questionmarks by a global constant.
timeline.author: gs4711
